title: Revert to Version 13

requirements.text: Revert the entire frontend codebase to its Version 13 state, undoing all changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20. This includes all pages, components, hooks, utilities, styles, and configuration files.
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend pages (Dashboard, Login, QuestionBank, AddQuestion, GeneratePaper, GeneratedPapers, PaperPreview) match their Version 13 implementation
All frontend components (Layout, StatsCard, WorkflowDiagram, PaperCard, PaperSection, QuestionCard, SubjectManager, EditQuestionModal) match their Version 13 implementation
All utility files, hooks, styles, and configuration files match their Version 13 state
No code changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20 remain in the frontend

requirements.text: Revert the entire backend codebase to its Version 13 state, undoing all changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20. This includes the main Motoko actor, data types, CRUD operations, and access control logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend main.mo actor matches its Version 13 implementation
All data types, CRUD operations, and role-based access control logic match their Version 13 state
No code changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20 remain in the backend

constraints: Do not introduce any new features or changes beyond restoring Version 13
Immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui) must not be modified
nonGoals: Applying any changes from Versions 14 through 20
